# Urban Runner Project Instructions (v3.1)  
_Last Updated: September 4, 2025_

## Core Mission  
A global movement for wealth redistribution ‚Äî one run at a time.  

## Episode Structure  
- Each episode = path of checkpoints with final recovery point.  
- Side events included as bonus cards.  
- Mission Complete summary + map at end.  

## Checkpoint Card System  
- **Main photo/video** = central focus (stylized into game world).  
- **Bottom-right tag** ‚Üí Activity (Fuel Up, Park Run, Gym, Donation, Tip, Bonus, Recover, Volleyball).  
- **Bottom-left corner** ‚Üí Local cash bill overlay.  
- **Spend Type Color Codes:**  
  - üõí Item Purchase = Blue  
  - ü§ù Donation = Green  
  - ‚ú® Tip = Gold  
- **Optional Boosts** (stamina, focus, endurance, etc).  
- **WhatsApp optimization** ‚Üí Always dark-contrast, GTA/AR style.  

## Maps  
- Source: Google Maps GPS timeline.  
- Base = real streets.  
- Running = blue solid line, car = green dashed line.  
- Checkpoints marked with spend type icons.  
- Totals: Distance, Time, Cash Spent, Cash Given.  
- Repeated routes glow brighter for ‚Äúdetail unlock.‚Äù  

## Cutscenes  
- Cinematic checkpoint videos.  
- Game ‚Üî real glitch transitions.  
- ‚ÄúCutscene Unlocked üé¨‚Äù with progress bar.  
- Use **scene-template.png** for comic-style panels (split-screens, 5-panel, flashbacks).  

## Episode Flow  
1. Start ‚Üí Budget & intention.  
2. Checkpoints ‚Üí Stylized cards.  
3. Bonus events ‚Üí Side-quest cards.  
4. Cutscenes ‚Üí Cinematic panels.  
5. Final recovery point.  
6. Mission Complete summary (map + recap).  

## Community Posting  
- Live: photos/videos posted raw.  
- After: stylized assets shared (cards, maps, cutscenes).  
- QR codes link to external info (maps, blogs, deeper stories).  
- WhatsApp pinned description remains constant.  

## Episode 7+ Enforcement  
- **All assets must use provided templates**:  
  - Cards: fuel-up-template-2.png, drop-template.png, side-quest-template.png, checkpoint-template-1.png / 3.png / 4.png, level-up-template.png, next-up-template.png.  
  - Episodes: episode-summary-template-1.png, map-template-1.png.  
  - Scenes: scene-template.png.  
- **Export Rule**: Every episode export includes  
  1. All visual/game assets (cards, graphics, maps, receipts, cutscenes)  
  2. A detailed Markdown story file (episode recap)  
  3. A structured JSON export file  

---

from pathlib import Path

# Recreate the updated instructions file after reset
updated_text = """# Urban Runner Project Instructions (v3.2 ‚Äì Morning Cover Update)
_Last Updated: September 4, 2025_

## Core Mission
A global movement for wealth redistribution ‚Äî one run at a time.

## Episode Structure
- Each episode = path of checkpoints with final recovery point.
- Side events included as bonus cards.
- Mission Complete summary + map at end.

## Checkpoint Card System
- **Main photo/video** = central focus (stylized into game world).
- **Bottom-right tag** ‚Üí Activity (Fuel Up, Park Run, Gym, Donation, Tip, Bonus, Recover, Volleyball).
- **Bottom-left corner** ‚Üí Local cash bill overlay.
- **Spend Type Color Codes:**
  - üõí Item Purchase = Blue
  - ü§ù Donation = Green
  - ‚ú® Tip = Gold
- **Optional Boosts** (stamina, focus, endurance, etc).
- **WhatsApp optimization** ‚Üí Always dark-contrast, GTA/AR style.

## Maps
- Source: Google Maps GPS timeline.
- Base = real streets.
- Running = blue solid line, car = green dashed line.
- Checkpoints marked with spend type icons.
- Totals: Distance, Time, Cash Spent, Cash Given.
- Repeated routes glow brighter for ‚Äúdetail unlock.‚Äù

## Cutscenes
- Cinematic checkpoint videos.
- Game ‚Üî real glitch transitions.
- ‚ÄúCutscene Unlocked üé¨‚Äù with progress bar.
- Use **scene-template.png** for comic-style panels (split-screens, 5-panel, flashbacks).

## Episode Flow
1. Start ‚Üí Budget & intention.
2. Checkpoints ‚Üí Stylized cards.
3. Bonus events ‚Üí Side-quest cards.
4. Cutscenes ‚Üí Cinematic panels.
5. Final recovery point.
6. Mission Complete summary (map + recap).

## Community Posting
- Live: photos/videos posted raw.
- After: stylized assets shared (cards, maps, cutscenes).
- QR codes link to external info (maps, blogs, deeper stories).
- WhatsApp pinned description remains constant.
- **Remote participation allowed** ‚Üí Players can contribute from anywhere (e.g., Jamie joined in Ep. 2 and contributed again remotely in Ep. 4). Their assets get stylized into the same episode.

## Episode 7+ Enforcement
- **All assets must use provided templates:**
  - Cards: fuel-up-template-2.png, drop-template.png, side-quest-template.png, checkpoint-template-1.png / 3.png / 4.png, level-up-template.png, next-up-template.png.
  - Episodes: episode-summary-template-1.png, map-template-1.png.
  - Scenes: scene-template.png.
- **Export Rule:** Every episode export includes:
  1. All visual/game assets (cards, graphics, maps, receipts, cutscenes)
  2. A detailed Markdown story file (episode recap)
  3. A structured JSON export file

## Episode Opening Rule (v3.2 Update)
- Each episode now **begins with a comic-style Episode Cover** (using `episode-cover.png` template).
- Player sets the **episode name each morning**.
- The cover is generated immediately and **posted in the WhatsApp community** to build hype and set the theme.
- All subsequent assets (checkpoints, scenes, side quests, maps, mission complete) follow the episode branding established on the cover.
"""

# Save as v3.2
new_file_path = Path("/mnt/data/urban-runner-instructions-v3.2.md")
new_file_path.write_text(updated_text, encoding="utf-8")

new_file_path
